alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:32PM CDT until July 21 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pickens County in west central Alabama... Western Greene County in west central Alabama... Northwestern Sumter County in west central Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New West Greene, or 9 miles south of Aliceville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Livingston, Aliceville, Boligee, Gainesville, Epes, Emelle, Memphis, New West Greene, Panola, West Greene, Geiger, Gainesville Lake Campground, Warsaw, New Mount Hebron, Sumterville, Clinton, George Downer Airport, Pleasant Ridge, Cochrane and Lewiston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
